text: Robert Stanley "Bob" Fitzsimmons (16 April 1917 – 21 April 1998) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Fitzroy and St Kilda in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * * Category:1917 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:St Kilda Football Club players CAtegory:1998 deaths
title: Bob Fitzsimmons (footballer)
